com.zenkey.net.prowser
Class RequestTestCase

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          com.zenkey.net.prowser.RequestTestCase
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class RequestTestCase
extends junit.framework.TestCase

The RequestTestCase class contains JUnit tests for the Request class.

The following assumptions are made about the location of the request files used to test the Request class:

  • The request files exist in the same directory as the source code for this class (RequestTestCase).
  • The source code for this class has its base directory in a directory called test that is a subdirectory in the containing project's root directory.
  • The *.class files generated by builds of the containing project are created in a directory called bin that is a subdirectory in the containing project's root directory.

Version:
$Revision$, $Date$
Author:
Michael A. Mangino

testInstantiationViaUri

public final void testInstantiationViaUri()
Tests instantiation of a Request via a URI argument. All default request properties should be tested here.

testInstantiationViaFile

public final void testInstantiationViaFile()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Tests instantiation of a Request via a request file. See RequestTestCase for info on the required location of the request files used by this method. See Request.Request(File) for info on the allowed content and format of the request files.
